title: TV Tropes will intervene in disputes between users

tosdr.case: The service can intervene in user disputes
tosdr.tldr: TV Tropes defines itself as a wiki and forum, and will not tolerate toxicity on it's platform. It will lock articles that are prone to aggressive editing, and take a cautious, middle-of-the-road stance on controversial topics. Users who vandalize page articles or attack other users will be banned, as the site has zero-tolerance policy on negative behavior.
